Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: Great location, close to 7 tram stop. Nice interior, friendly people. Good food, i wish they had more options.

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: Good drinks, friendly staff and a peaceful corner ! we got a table outside in a rainy day and ejoyed a bit  the warms of a heater!

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: Very nice pub with a good variety of beers and a selection of classical pub dishes including vegan friendly burgers. Prices are normal for Amsterdam. The burger was juicy and done medium rare, fries were as expected, crunchy and delicious. …

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: Good fries (with mayo) and dry, white wine. Although I ordered also elderflower, lemon, rhubarb cider, of brand KUGI. It was so disappointing. It tasted as if someone dissolved calcium in sparkling water. I didn't enjoy drinking that at all.

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: We passed the restaurant while cycling and stopped. They have several tables outside also. Food was really good, service also. It was a good choice.

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: This little gem of Amsterdam makes me super happy that you can still find great food, great drinks and friendly staff at an affordable price . Check it out!

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: My friend and I were cycling on the way home and came across this super cozy bar! Not only is the location amazing (in the center but not amongst the hustle and bustle) but the service was perfect. And the food looked delicious! …

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: great place to get drinks and oysters are absolutely awesome

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: Nice cozy corner pub! Went there for some drinks. Friendly staff. Btw, my red wine glass was very little poured… love the vibe!

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text:
Great place and excellent service. Food was delicious and they have good local beer.
The outdoor seats are great for a relaxing evening

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: Plenty of beers to choose from, acceptable price levels and lasy but not least a friendly team!

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: Their cheeseburger is delicious! Also good service and cozy atmosphere.

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: Very friendly service and welcome vibe . The food that we try was very very good and the whole atmosphere is really nice .definitely came back .

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: Chill bar with outdoor tables, great beer selections!

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: One of the best sandwiches I've ever had - smoked salmon with picked onions on a lovely whole wheat sunflower seed bun

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: Nice place, nice people, good food in a nice environment!!

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: A cozy and comfortable cafe. I've biked by this place multiple times and I was not disappointed. Would highly recommend as a casual and cozy place for drinks or coffee with a friend (or someone of your same household). They also have vegan biterballen!

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: Excellent food at a great price. Every entrée was fabulous, the terrine incredible, the artichoke delicious. Serves a healthy portion of good soup and a perfect side of beans. We went back the next day.

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: Great terrace, good beers, friendly service, OK food with a good collection of vegan bitterballen & frikadellen to name a few!)

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: Nice place, fantastic people

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: Beautiful bar, short but good beer choice, good food, phenomenal fries. Probably best fries in Amsterdam. Try the fries. Addicted to these bloody fries...

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: Nice, friendly local bar. Nice outdoor terrace. Good service and little of the tourist tracks. Recommended.

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: Smallest glass of wine I was ever poured in my life. And I'm a bar manager.

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: Nice local café. Nice sunny outodoor serving in the afternoon. Friendly staff. Good service. Well worth a visit.

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text:
Lovely little place to relax, next week to the river and very quiet.

The lady who served us was very nice and friendly.

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: A very cozy place, spent there a couple of hours, drawing and drinking coffee. It wasn't busy even though I'd expect such place to be during Saturday lunchtime

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: Loved the atmosphere, finger foods, and ambiance. Very Amsterdam. Mixed age group of clientele.

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: Our favorite stop on the way home for drinks or dinner! A great spot in the evening sun, and cosy inside too.

Name: De Groene Olifant
Review Text: Friendly stuff but they're pretty slow
